name: Five Night's At Endo's
description:
Five nights at endo's AKA(FNAE) is a fan inspired game by Five nights at freddy's

The Original Creator Of The Game Is Scott Braden Cawthon

The Creator Of Five Nights At Endo's Is Hamza Yasser AKA (Arsenik)

Story

EndoSkeleton horror is looking for a night guard to work from 12AM to 5AM 

The EndoSkeleton is in the cams and he could appear from time to time in another

cam. But once he appears in the left office  door he will jumpscare you 

This might look not creepy because it's in Demo Just Wait

There is also Easter eggs in this game that could appear in the nights but it's Rare

There is A way to counter these Easter eggs it's hidden

Lore (still demo) :

You Might See Something is written on the newspaper Which Says ("SCINORTAMINA REHTO ERA EREHT ")

In this version you might see only one Just Wait

Endoskeleton is scared of light that's why you see him in cams kinda dark

EndoSkeleton is so fast that even once he reaches your door he Kills You

YOU SHOULD HAVE PRESSED THE BUTTON

Warning:
THIS GAME CONTAINS JUMPSCARES FLASH IMAGES AND MORE HORROR THINGS.

NOTE:

THIS GAME WILL NOTE BE UPDATED UNTIL NEXT SUMMER WHICH IS IN LIKE 6 OR 7 MONTHS SO PLEASE BE PATIENCE TO SEE THE NEXT UPDATES ! 

AND ALWAYS REMEMBER..........Just Wait
